results.title: Mainstreaming in action (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Togg Films, Ellen Barnes and Grania Gurievitch
results.brief_description: Shows several elementary and secondary classrooms in public schools as teachers work with disabled students as part of regular classroom sessions. Discusses solutions to problems teachers may encounter, the practicality of mainstreaming, what it means, and how it affects teachers and students. Suitable for teacher/tertiary levels.

results.title: Mainly monkeys. Koalas and co
results.creator_credit: Rob McCubbin, Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Louise Jonas
results.brief_description: Contains two programmes filmed at Melbourne Zoo. 1.”Mainly monkeys” shows the social behaviour of groups of monkeys and other primates that live in trees. 2.”Koalas and Co.” observes some Australian animals adapted for life in trees, such as koalas, fruit bats, tree frogs and lizards. Both programmes are non-narrated, making use of natural sound.

results.title: Mainly monkeys
results.creator_credit: Louise Jonas, Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Rob McCubbin
results.brief_description: Filmed in close detail at the Royal Melbourne Zoological Gardens, the Sir Colin Mackenzie Fauna Park, Healesville and the Royal Botanic Gardens, Melbourne, with minimal evidence of enclosures. Shows groups of monkeys and other primates living in trees, their feeding and grooming habits, their method of communication and care of the young. Adapted from “A Zoo in the trees”. Non-narrated using natural sound. Suitable for middle and upper pprimary levels.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Louise Jonas, Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development and Rob McCubbin

results.title: Maine harbour town
results.creator_credit: Louis de Rochemont Associates, United World Films and John A. Haeseler
results.brief_description: An impression of life in a coastal community of New England, USA. In this region where the soil is poor and stony and the growing season short, the people turn to various occupations to supplement their income. The Kellors who live in Camden, Maine, are a typical New England family. They earn what they can from their farm and dairy herd, but find it necessary to add to their income by working in the factories and mills, by fishing, and by accepting tourists into their home as paying guests.

results.title: Main control
results.creator_credit: Jon Miller, British Broadcasting Corporation and Open University
results.brief_description: The last in a series of films of the ABC’s (American Broadcasting Corporation) television coverage of the 1976 Republican Convention in Kansas City. Covers the climax of the convention from the main control room, showing the ballot for the nomination, beginning as the ABC goes on the air and ending just after Gerald Ford wins the nomination. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Maimed artist
results.creator_credit: Gonzo Media Group and Nicholas C Gorski
results.brief_description: This interesting program gives background information to a news story that was run in San Francisco about an artist who maimed himself while pursuing his art. Three artists use shock tactics to get people interested in their performance art. They specifically use machines they have modified or built and fire as part of their art. While working on a piece of art Mark Pauline blew most of his left hand off.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gonzo Media Group and Nicholas C Gorski

results.title: Mail Order Bride (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Michael Carson, ABC-TV (Australia) and Stephen Wallace
results.brief_description: Kevin Saunders, a builder in the small country town of Badigeri, decides to import a Filipino bride, but in doing so he also imports a few problems. At first it seems as if his marriage to the pretty Ampy has potential, but the local townsfolk are both racist and sexist and Ampy, struggling to find her place in the town, finds difficulty in dealing with the conflicting pressures. Starring Ray Meagher and Charito Ortez.
